title: Manufacturing Design Engineer (MDE) - Home
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.
description: A mechanical and/or manufacturing engineer to take products from concept/brainstorm to mass production, as-well-as being able to audit existing processes to find opportunities. Daily activities can range from program management, to brainstorming solutions, to advanced data analysis. The ideal candidate will have an understanding of processes including (but not limited to) machining, welding, stamping, forging, plating, and other forming/finishing methods.
key_qualifications:
2+ years of mechanical and/or manufacturing experience
Bachelors degree in Engineering (Mechanical, Manufacturing, etc)
preferred_qualifications:
Mechanical background, preferably with experience in a high volume manufacturing environment.
Knowledge base of a range of manufacturing techniques, and experience with troubleshooting of some processes.
Experience with data analysis through JMP or Minitab to understand outcomes of experiments is desired.
Experience with driving a tight schedule, and helping to define micro schedules is helpful.
Master's degree preferred
